fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Dangerous: You have a hand size of 6 and draw 1 more card every phase. 
- Mask: Choose a role to disguise as within the first phase of the game. You will appear to win with others according to the role you chose.
- Tough Skin: You are immune to Chaos factionâ€™s Night phase attack.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Frozen Statue: Pick a player. If they die in this phase, they will become a frozen statue. They will appear to still be alive for the next phase and may be targeted by cards and abilities still, but cannot talk in chat. They are officially 'killed' the following phase. [2 uses, Unique]
- Snowman: Create a Snowman with 1 HP, 2 hand size, and 1 channel. It draws 2 cards a phase.  It will not show up on the player list, but you may play cards as if it were a player. You may only have 1 Snowman at a time. Gains a use for every player you Kill. [1 use, Recharging]
- Snow Golem: Create a Snow Golem with 3 HP and 5 Hand Space. It draws 3 cards a phase. It appears on the playerlist and may be targeted, but you may play cards as if it were a player. Gain a use for every three players you Kill. [0 uses, Recharging]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
